template.name: tradfrigroup
template.value: elif Groups.$NAME$ == group.name or (isinstance(Groups.$NAME$, Group) and Groups.$NAME$.id == group.id): Groups.$NAME$ = group
template.description: Add a check for a new tradfri group

template.name: tradfrilight
template.value: elif Lights.$NAME$ == device.name or (isinstance(Lights.$NAME$, Device) and Lights.$NAME$.has_socket_control and Lights.$NAME$.id == device.id): Lights.$NAME$ = device
template.description: Add a check for a new tradfri light
